ValidationRule.description: Cannot enter a HSA Cancel Date until pending Tasks are completed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISNULL( POP_Downgrade_Complete__c ))&& ( CONTAINS( Pending_FSA_Tasks__c , "Pending POP Setup")|| CONTAINS( Pending_FSA_Tasks__c , "Pending POP Termination")|| CONTAINS( Pending_FSA_Tasks__c , "Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy")|| CONTAINS( Pending_FSA_Tasks__c , "CPR NPR Callout") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot fill out "POP Cancel Date Entered" until the following Pending Tasks are Resolved: Pending POP Setup, Pending POP Termination, CPR NPR Callout, and Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy
